results.content:
Excellent view of what means working with Dropwizard but more importantly with Dockers / Kubernetes and the way to put your application up in the cloud with Google.

Suggestion: I'd test with white/light-gray background, although it is fine as it is.

results.content:
This course was very good covering writing a service, running it locally, deploying it to Google cloud.
The course doesn't give enough explanation for many things; However, this would require a course with more than 7 hours which will make the course tedious.
I liked this course and the information provided in it.

results.content:
Unfortunately I did not get anything out of this course.  I couldn't understand the presenter's accent.  I tried slowing down the audio, but it didn't help.  I tried reading the captions, but they were auto-generated so they didn't make any sense at all (the generator clearly couldn't decipher the presenter's accent either).

Watch the preview videos.  If you can clearly understand what is being said, then you should try the course.  It appears to have good content.  If you can't understand what is said in the preview course, you won't get anything out of this course.
results.content_html:
Unfortunately I did not get anything out of this course. I couldn't understand the presenter's accent. I tried slowing down the audio, but it didn't help. I tried reading the captions, but they were auto-generated so they didn't make any sense at all (the generator clearly couldn't decipher the presenter's accent either).

Watch the preview videos. If you can clearly understand what is being said, then you should try the course. It appears to have good content. If you can't understand what is said in the preview course, you won't get anything out of this course.
